Package assignment6.chatRoomApp

Interface ChatRoomProtocol

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProtocolHandler
public interface ChatRoomProtocol
The interface is designed to represent the chat room protocol providing the read and write functions for client and server to process the message frame data.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    BROADCAST_MESSAGE
    send broadcast message request to the server
    static final int
    CONNECT_MESSAGE
    send connect message to the server

    static final int

    static final int
    QUERY_USER_RESPONSE

    static final int

    send insult message request to the server
